string.text: %c[ui_gray_2]In Soulslike mode, death isn’t truly the end. Instead, you are rescued by a random stalker in the Zone, who brings you back to your last set spawn location. Upon waking, you’ll find a message from your rescuer detailing where you were found and the effort it took to get you to safety. However, all the items you were carrying must be retrieved — some may be lost, and others will likely have suffered condition degradation.\n %c[ui_red] • NOT compatible with Azazel mode.\n %c[ui_red] • NOT compatible with Ironman.
